column2: music not too loud and tables were set up for couples
column5: or by the coffee bar. The food is overpriced in my opinion and my friend thought the bakery items were too
column6: but the drinks were reasonable. I got two macarons (which I would normally never pay for
column7: but had a craving for sweets) vanilla and citrus
column8: and a vanilla latte. I studied there with my friend and was able to concentrate. One thing I didn't like was that it was freezing. And I was wearing leggings and drinking a hot drink. It was in my favorite coffee district too by Agora and Empire so if I had to choose one I wouldn't pick CB as my go to.
